channel.title: Financial Analysis on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Financial Analysis on FinanClub

item.title: O
item.description: score:-111 Chances: Realty Income Corp. (O) should be added to one’s portfolio based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR). These monthly dividend payers are offering something few stocks can, making them attractive for investment. Risks: Wall Street analysts’ overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of the highly sought-after metric of average brokerage recommendation (ABR).

item.title: KSS
item.description: score:20 Chances: Kohl’s shares jumped 7.3% in solidarity with Macy’s after an investor group made a $5.8 billion offer to take Macy’s private Risks: The retail industry is facing challenges such as stiff competition from online rivals and high inflation Score:20 chances characters count - risks characters count = -980
